timeline.title: Started Backend Development
timeline.subtitle: Python & Laravel Foundation
timeline.description: Began my journey into backend development, learning Python fundamentals and exploring Laravel for web development. Built my first database-driven applications and discovered my passion for server-side logic.

timeline.title: Scalable APIs with Django
timeline.subtitle: School Power Schedule Project
timeline.description: Developed a comprehensive school power schedule management system using Django. This project taught me about API design, database optimization, and handling real-world business logic.
achievements: Built RESTful APIs serving 500+ daily requests
Optimized database queries for better performance

timeline.title: Team Leadership & Complex Systems
timeline.subtitle: Student Task Tracking System
timeline.description: Led backend development for a student task tracking system, managing a small team and implementing complex business logic. Focused on code quality, testing, and maintainable architecture.

timeline.title: Freelance & Client Solutions
timeline.subtitle: Secure & Maintainable Systems
timeline.description: Transitioned to freelance work, building secure and maintainable backend systems for various clients. Focused on delivering high-quality solutions that scale with business needs.
